description: Alphanumeric size code identifying a tire specification (dimensions/construction/rim) used on fleet equipment.
Human-readable description for the tire size entry, often mirroring the size code or providing expanded dimensions or notes for identification.
Username or system process that created this tire size record.
Timestamp when this tire size record was created in the system.
Username or system process that last updated this tire size record.
Timestamp of the most recent update to this tire size record.
